text: Merrillville is an unincorporated community in Thomas County, in the U.S. state of Georgia. ==History== A post office called Merrillville was established in 1900, and remained in operation until 1933. The Georgia General Assembly incorporated Merrillville as a town in 1902. ==References== Category:Former municipalities in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Unincorporated communities in Thomas County, Georgia
title: Merrillville, Georgia
